subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Justin Beaver and Wisconsin-Whitewater finally found a way to defeat Mount Union in the N.C.A.A. Division III championship game.Beaver, the Gagliardi Trophy winner as the best player in Division III, overcame a costly fumble, leading the Warhawks to a 31-21 victory Saturday in the Amos Alonzo Stagg Bowl in Salem, Va.The Warhawks won their first national title after losing, 35-28, to Mount Union in the 2005 championship game.Wisconsin-Whitewater (14-1) ended Mount Union’s 37-game winning streak and deprived the Purple Raiders (14-1) of their 10th national title in the last 15 years.
